哩度係唔係有位師兄叫600RR

係唔係渣600RR

Application Developer (at the rank of Technical Officer) in the Faculty of Dentistry (Ref.: 500178) (to commence as soon as possible for one year, with the possibility of renewal)

Applicants should have a Higher Diploma or above in Computer Engineering/Computer Science/Multimedia or a related discipline, with proven work experience in web system programming. Those with a Bachelor’s degree are preferable. They should be familiar with server-side technologies (e.g. PHP, NodeJS, Python, MySQL, MongoDB) and front-end techniques (e.g. HTML5/CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, ReactJS, VueJS); have good problem solving and communication skills; and be able to work under tight schedule.

The appointee will write well-designed, testable, maintainable and efficient code of a learning management system; work with researchers/teachers to refine specifications and requirements of the system; and prepare software documentation/user guide of the system. Those who have responded to the previous advertisement (Ref.: 499840) need not re-apply.

A highly competitive salary commensurate with qualifications and experience will be offered, in addition to annual leave and medical benefits.

The University only accepts online application for the above post. Applicants should apply online and upload an up-to-date C.V. Review of applications will start as soon as possible and continue until June 2, 2020, or until the post is filled, whichever is earlier.

Advertised:May 15, 2020 (HK Time)
Applications close:Jun 2, 2020 (HK Time)
